5. Normal reference values 
RBS:70-110 mg/dl 
FBS: 70- 99mg/dl 
PPBS:<140mg/dl
6. Viewing test results in meter memory 
 ∙ The test result will appear after the meter counts down from 5 to 1. The result will be au-
tomatically stored in the meter’s memory. If the test strip is removed after the test result is 
displayed, the meter will automatically switch off after 3 seconds. Discard used test strips safely 
in biohazard containers.
